comment:
* A MenuPopupWindow represents the popup window for menu.
 *
 * MenuPopupWindow is mostly same as ListPopupWindow, but it has customized
 * behaviors specific to menus,
 *
 * @hide

methods.name: public void setTouchModal(boolean touchModal)
methods.comment:
* Set whether this window is touch modal or if outside touches will be sent to
     * other windows behind it.

methods.name: public void onItemHoverEnter(@NonNull MenuBuilder menu, @NonNull MenuItem item)
public void onItemHoverExit(@NonNull MenuBuilder menu, @NonNull MenuItem item)

methodNames: public void onItemHoverEnter(@NonNull MenuBuilder menu, @NonNull MenuItem item)
public void onItemHoverExit(@NonNull MenuBuilder menu, @NonNull MenuItem item)
